name: vscode-copilot-insights
description: Understand your GitHub Copilot plan, quotas, and limits at a glance

copilotInsights.showMood.description: Show a fun 'mood' indicator for your remaining quota instead of the standard status.

enumDescriptions: Show remaining quota (bar empties as you use requests)
Show used quota (bar fills as you use requests)
copilotInsights.progressBarMode.description: Controls how the progress bar displays quota: 'remaining' shows quota left (default), 'used' shows quota consumed.

enumDescriptions: Show status bar on the right side (original location)
Show status bar on the left side (bottom status bar)
Show status bar on both sides
copilotInsights.statusBarLocation.description: Controls where the Copilot status bar appears: 'right' (original location), 'left' (bottom status bar), or 'both' (show on both sides).

enumDescriptions: Original (Detailed): Show name, numerical quota and percentage (e.g., 'Copilot: 20/100 (80%)')
Progress Capsule: Show percentage wrapped in large circular caps (e.g., 'â—– 80% â——')
Circular Progress Ring: Show a circular ring progression (e.g., 'â—” 80%')
Solid Progress Bar: Show visual solid blocks (e.g., 'â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–‘ 80%')
Shaded Progress Bar: Show visual shaded blocks (e.g., 'â–“â–“â–“â–“â–‘ 80%')
Minimalist: Show icon and percentage only (e.g., '80%')
Adaptive Status Emoji: Show an emoji-based status indicator (e.g., 'ðŸ˜Œ 80%')
copilotInsights.statusBarStyle.description: Controls the visual style of the status bar indicator.

copilotInsights.statusBar.showNumericalQ.description: Show numerical quota (e.g., '20/100') in status bar.

copilotInsights.statusBar.showVisualIndi.description: Show visual indicator (e.g., progress bars, rings, emojis) in status bar.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
